scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'redis,express,next,video-server' -c '#04FCF1,#9c143f,#85590d,#0FFC03' "redis-server" "cd express && npm run dev" "cd next && npm run dev" "cd video-server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd next && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start: concurrently -n 'express,next,video-server,redis' -c '#9c143f,#85590d,#0FFC03,#04FCF1' "cd express && npm run start" "cd next && npm run start" "cd video-server && npm run start" "redis-server"
scripts.installAll: npm install && cd express && npm install && cd ../next && npm install && cd ../video-server && npm install
scripts.dev:all: gnome-terminal --window --title=JASMA-API -x sh -i -c "cd express && npm run dev" && gnome-terminal --window --title=JASMA-NEXT -x sh -i -c "cd next && npm run dev" && gnome-terminal --window --title=JASMA-MEDIA-SERVER -x sh -i -c "cd video-server && npm run dev"
scripts.start:all: gnome-terminal --window --title=JASMA-API -x sh -i -c "npm run checkServices && cd express && npm run start" && gnome-terminal --window --title=JASMA-NEXT -x sh -i -c "cd next && npm run start" && gnome-terminal --window --title=JASMA-MEDIA-SERVER -x sh -i -c "cd video-server && npm run start"
scripts.start:pm2: cd express && pm2 start npm --name "JASMA-API" -- start && cd ../next && pm2 start npm --name "JASMA-NEXT" -- start && cd ../video-server && pm2 start npm --name "JASMA-MEDIA-SERVER" -- start && cd ..
scripts.stop:pm2: pm2 stop JASMA-API && pm2 stop JASMA-NEXT && pm2 stop JASMA-MEDIA-SERVER
scripts.restart:pm2: npm run stop:pm2 && pm2 start JASMA-API && pm2 start JASMA-NEXT && pm2 start JASMA-MEDIA-SERVER
scripts.check:services: systemctl status postgresql && systemctl status redis-server && systemctl status nginx && echo "Current listening ports:" && sudo ss -lntup && pm2 ls
